subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Joe Durant remained in position for his first PGA Tour victory since 2006, birdieing the final two holes for a two-under 69 and a two-stroke lead in the Mayakoba Golf Classic.
snippet: Joe Durant remained in position for his first PGA Tour victory since 2006, birdieing the final two holes for a two-under 69 and a two-stroke lead in the Mayakoba Golf Classic.
